name: Timer
tagline: This is Simple Timer for Windows OS with .NET 4.0
body: DM Timer is timer for Windows OS.It is simple program with small size,which uses .NET framework 4.0.You can download .NET 4.0 http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851 with this link in Microsoft official page.Download Zip files with source code or download only [Setup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/davemk99/Timer/master/Setup/Setup.exe) file
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
